In this paragraph, there is only one potential chemical entity mentioned, which is "intact left ventricular wall." This term refers to the physical structure of the left ventricular wall in the heart, which is composed of various proteins and other biological molecules. However, in the context of this paragraph, it is being referred to as a whole entity rather than specifically as a chemical compound.
